channel.title: CVE Feed for Nuggethon -- Custom Order Statuses for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nuggethon -- Custom Order Statuses for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-32524|2024-04-17T07:29:59.164Z -- nuggethon -- custom%20order%20statuses%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Nuggethon Custom Order Statuses for WooCommerce.This issue affects Custom Order Statuses for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-25930|2024-06-04T17:34:57.783Z -- nuggethon -- custom%20order%20statuses%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Nuggethon Custom Order Statuses for WooCommerce.This issue affects Custom Order Statuses for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.5.2.
